title: By-pass
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Arch Nicholson
brief_description: A short film illustrating a typical administrative problem for discussion. Two office workers produce innovative designs that may prove to have long range cost-saving benefits. Neither of their superiors appears to be appreciative. One designer decides to by-pass his approach to his superior. Suitable for upper secondary level.
